name: C3D - 3D Drawing & Modelling
description:
"C" in 3D with C3D!

Draw colorful lines and watch them step into the next dimension. C3D is the best way to create beautiful 3D models.

*Empowering.
Let your mind flow. Draw curves, choose colors, watch magic happen. Adding another dimension has never been easier.

*Beautiful.
Minimalistic interface leaves stage to what's most important - your creations.

*Expressive.
Snap pictures of your models and post them to Twitter and Facebook or share entire models by e-mail with .stl and .obj formats for 3D printer support. Let your friends wrap their heads around your ingenuity.

*Made with Passion.
Top to bottom one man job. Every single detail has been obsessively polished. Over and over (and over) again.
